subject: SPECIAL PHARMACY DISCOUNT, you pay  & we ship, no question asked, established by reputable Canadian Doctor tstzz
body: 1. When animals are divided in three ways into aquatic and land animals, because they either breathe air or water, or from the composition of their bodies; or, in the third place, from their food, their manner of life will be found to agree with these divisions. For some follow both the composition of their bodies and the nature of their food, and their respiration of either water or air. Others only agree with their composition and food.
